pubsImpTaskBody.p: An administrator can perform the following operations for Premium Experience Services for your organization:

li.p: View statistics on the number of users, models published, and models remaining for a Premium Service.
Add and delete users, and manage access permissions for users.
View and manage models published by all users.
Modify the viewers list for models published by all users.

section.title: Experience Portal Statistics
section.p:
On the Admin Dashboard, you can see the following statistics:
Authors – Total number of users who can publish and share the experience models. The user may have author or administrator permissions.
Models Published – Total number of models published by all the users for the selected Premium Service.
Models Remaining – Total number of models that you can publish to the Premium Service. This number is determined based on the license package that you have opted for.
Views Consumed – Number of times experience models are viewed using . Each time a user views an experience model using the count is incremented by 1. However, if the user views the same experience model, multiple times in 15 minutes, the view consumed is counted as 1.

section.title: To Add a User

li.p: On the Admin Dashboard, click Add User to add a user to the selected Premium Experience Service. The Add User dialog box appears.
Enter the email ID of the user.
From the Role dropdown list, select one of the following roles:
Admin – The user will be added as an administrator for the selected Premium Service.
Author – The user will be added as an author and will have rights to publish and share models on the selected Premium Experience Service.

section.p: To delete a user, click under Delete on the user row. If you delete a user, all the models published by the user will be assigned to you and can be viewed on the Model Dashboard.
You can change the access permission of an existing user by selecting Author or Admin from the Role dropdown list on the Admin Dashboard.

section.title: To Manage Experiences Published by Other Users
section.p: On the Admin Dashboard, click View under the Models column to view the models published by a user to the Premium Experience Service. The Model Dashboard tab opens displaying a list of Experience models with the date of publish.

section.title: To Manage Viewers for an Experience Model
section.p:
On the Model Dashboard, you can do the following:
Click to view the list of users who have view access to the model.
Click to add a viewer. The Add Viewer dialog box appears. Enter the email ID of the user with whom you want to share the model and click Add.
Click to delete a user from the list. The deleted user will no longer be able to view the model.
Click to share the model with others.
